Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: lindaaa1
Reviews.Content: This is no fancy smartphone with apps and a touchscreen, but it still is a great phone. The QWERTY keyboard is easy to use, and has a variety of messaging options, such as text messaging, picture messaging, email, instant messaging (great for me to chat with my buddies on Yahoo), and you can even send people an audio postcard. As a messaging addict who has to bring her phone everywhere, and sends about 4,000 text messages each month (a little too much, maybe?) this is a great phone to connect with other people. Call quality isn't bad, but I never really call anybody anyways. There's no unusual static or muffled noise. I like that it has a music player so I can listen to music. It has a background playing option to play music while I do something, like text message. Excellent for when I'm too lazy to turn on my iPod. The internet browser doesn't have lighting fast 4g speed like many phones today, but 3g is enough for someone, like me, who occasionally browses the web and checks her Facebook daily. The T-Mobile social buzz app is convenient, but I prefer going on Facebook through the mobile browser. It has a good battery life span, and doesn't need nightly charging like my previous phone. It also has a 1.3 megapixel camera for taking pictures and video recording. I use an 8GB MicrSsd card with this phone, but the maximum you could use is 16GB. It has Bluetooth too, great for headsets, transferring files, etc.There are things I would change about this phone, however. Many complain about the name that actually uses the emoticon ":)". I don't really mind, though. One con for me would be the color scheme. I don't mind it's dark and black, but it would be nice to have more brighter colors. Oh well, it's not a big problem. It doesn't have a headphone jack, but you can always get an adapter or the headset made for this phone. The camera quality isn't the best, since it is 1.3 megapixels, but I don't need any professional photographer quality.All in all, it's an excellent phone. I wouldn't recommend it to those who are used to fancy smartphones and touchscreens, but it's great for those who look for an easy-to-use and simple messaging phone with a QWERTY keyboard(especially teenagers).

Reviews.Title: Excellent little phone
Reviews.Author: L. Shumway "LAS"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung T359 is a great little phone for someone who does not feel the need to be glued to the phone constantly. If you must have a smart phone, look at a little higher price range. If you just want something that is easy for making phone calls, sending texts and sending the occasional picture message with basic internet coverage, this is a good choice. The phone slides out to reveal a full textboard. Games are available for purchase and you can easily customize your ring tones. With t-mobile--as I had occasion to find out when I spilled water on my old phone, it's a simple matter to move your sim card from one t-mobile phone to an unlocked one without having to pay an activation fee(they'll charge $15 for this if you buy a new phone from them).

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone !
Reviews.Author: B. Whiting
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this phone. Recently, my other phone was starting to die. I was reticent to buy another phone because I've hated other "upgrades" I'd gotten as they were too inconvenient to use. The reviews were really high on this phone so I decided to give it a try. It was such a smooth transition from my old flip phone. It has so many familiar features only each upgraded to work even better. The sound quality is great. The speaker phone works really well. The music playing is great. It is really easy to use. It is sleek and classy looking. I am so glad I bought it and you will be to. I dont' use the internet or email, so can't vouch for those features. But, I wanted a phone that I could transition to those features if I ever decided to. I just call, text and take photos and this phone works great for me. The pictures are high quality too.

Reviews.Title: Great talking and texting phone
Reviews.Author: Beckster
Reviews.Content: I had this phone already from T-mobile but after a really hard drop on concrete the screen cracked leaving part of it unreadable.  I ordered this as a replacement because it was cheaper than through T-mobile since I didn't have a replacement plan.  Bonus was this phone came with a wall charger AND car charger.  I only use this phone for talking and texting and its great for both those things.  I love the vertical slider versus the sideways slider.  If you're looking for a basic phone that does texting also and your fingers aren't too big for the smaller QWERTY keys I would definitely recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my daughter, to replace a touch screen that fizzled out due to humidity. This one has worked well -she's had it for about a year now -without internet access. She can't take pictures any more because the slide some how interferes and has scratched the lens- error in design I suppose.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Smiley
Reviews.Author: Avery Watson
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a little bit more than a year.  However, I didn't purchase it via Amazon.  When I first got it I created contacts very easily; I like how you can add special info about the contact as well.  It is fairly easy to text with its QWERTY keyboard.  I love how it slides up and not from the side with most modern smartphones.  This smartphone is not your fancy schmancy iPhone though.  However, that suits me better because the touch screen on some smartphones can be very sensitive and ANNOYING!  You do have to pay for apps and the Internet on this phone; I don't purchase or pay for it because I have other devices that have apps.  I love the "Organizer" feature in the menu with the calculator, memos, tasks, etc.  OVERALL THE NAME OF THIS PHONE MAKES SENSE BECAUSE I AM ALWAYS SMILING WHEN USING IT!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TEXTING PHONE!
Reviews.Author: Christen J. Reimer "GAME SONIC"
Reviews.Content: Great phone,no problem and it works fast. The camera works good and has 1.3 megapixles. Internet works fast and never really crashed. It comes preloaded with apps and email. Overall,  MUST GET PHONE!!!5 stars out of 5

Reviews.Title: Good little phone
Reviews.Author: Ric
Reviews.Content: Its good for talking on the phone and texting nothing more nothing less. Web interface is not very good but does have some apps you can download. Camera is adequate...

Reviews.Title: good solid phone
Reviews.Author: shipnsnow
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone and I was pretty happy about the price--I've had it for several months now and I am still happy.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: laura hannah
Reviews.Content: This phone stopped working after 3 months. I am not happy!! I cannot call or text,the screen is just white.

Reviews.Title: replacement phone
Reviews.Author: leonard  Sevier
Reviews.Content: this phone was just as if we had bought it new from a store front. all parts were as stated

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: ironman2326
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone...only thing I don't like is that I haven't been able to accept or send picture msgs. T-mobile hasn't been able to figure it out yet. Also the software to load media onto it only seems to work once after I install it, so every time I want to load media on it I have to uninstall and reinstall it. Otherwise it won't recognize my phone.

Reviews.Title: Saved!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Jackson
Reviews.Content: My previous Samsung T-359 was stolen in a burglary. As it turned out, I had backed up the contacts and the calendar the day before the theft. it took 2 minutes to restore my data on this replacement phone. It's a great phone whose battery charge lasts for days.

Reviews.Title: 10 months owned was great at first, horrible in the end
Reviews.Author: Mobile, AL Tide
Reviews.Content: Purchased in first of June 2012 and internet, camera, phone (voice clarity/quality) all top notch... then came the problems.  The sliding open nature of the phone to text will destroy the lens on the camera no matter what you do.  So in say...4 months, kiss your camera goodbye as everything will be totally clouded over.  Any kind of moisture gets on this phone...seeya!  My aunt got a couple of drops of water and now hers cant use any buttons on the top of the phone.  I stay right smack dab next to a T-Mobile tower and every single time (yes EVERY TIME) I go to use the "web browser" it immediately cuts off the internet connection and I have to go through 5 to 6 relaunches to get the page Im seeking to pull up.  Pro side:  voice clarity, and the fact that I tripped and launched my phone a good 8 feet in the air and 20 feet downrange until it landed on concrete and came apart with the phone going one way, battery another, and back cover yet another.  I knew the phone was DOA, but put it all back together and it worked fine.  But overall, you can buy a MUCH better phone for a measley $50 more.

Reviews.Title: I will recommend
Reviews.Author: Ariyo Bello
Reviews.Content: It was doing what just what i wanted it to do. It is a simple phone and i will recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone for the price!
Reviews.Author: What a Wonderful Life!
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my teenage daughter, after I accidentally soaked her old phone and it no longer worked.  She is very happy with everything, except the supplier through Amazon sent us a bad charger cord that looked like it had been wet and abused.  The tag was white and almost falling off when we got it and had a short in it.  But, the phone works great, and my daughter likes it better than her old phone.  She has had it for a couple months now.  It texts well and has a lot of options.  Good value!  It was a good option instead of adding another two years to our phone contract.

Reviews.Title: Samsung  Smiley phone:  happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: deekay94
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my 13 yo daughter....it is difficult to find phones that do not have and internet plan attached to them...This is a great phone for the $$.  She loves it and it is easy to use.  Would order it again if I had the opportunity to do over.  Keyboard is great for texting....

Reviews.Title: blank squeen
Reviews.Author: AL pat
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these phones and one of them went blank. I liked the phones ease of use and because I understood its functions bought another one. I must be stupid but time will tell

Reviews.Title: only lasted a week
Reviews.Author: suhhsahh
Reviews.Content: one word, BOOOOORING!!! there is nothing to do on this phone but talk and text.pros: nothing at all cons: keyboard too crowded screen to weak and everything else is terriblethis phone should not have samsung written on it it should have some stupid company that would actually make this phone on it. i now upgraded to a samsung gravity t and it rocks now thats a phone i would recommend.

ProductInfo.Features:
Multiple Messaging Options
Multimedia Package
Web-enabled Via Web2go
Ultimate Messaging Device
Easy-to-Use Vertical Slider
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T359 Smiley Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard and 1.3MP Camera - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black/Blue
